description.base: You charge your hands up with electricity and attempt to touch an opponent.  If you succeed, the target takes 8 to 16 damage plus one per caster level.  Otherwise, the electricity harmlessly dissipates.

upgrades.LightningBolt: With Lightning Bolt, all creatures within 1 hex of a selected hostile target take 8 to 16 plus one per caster level damage
upgrades.DisablingLightning: With Disabling Lightning, Shock now temporarily cripples opponents for 3 rounds.  Affected targets suffer a 10 plus one per caster level penalty to Spell Failure and Attack.
